channel.title: Vitrine theme - Demo 26 ( electronic - single product )

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: LookBook
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row gap="zero"][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_col-xs-1"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-xs-10"][vc_empty_space height="120"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="250"]

LOOKBOOK

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="250"]

Thino is both a charging cable and an external battery. It has a dedicated plug and flexible band/cable for charging.Also, Thino can be used as a portable battery in urgent situations, using its built-in battery.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="100"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_col-xs-1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1495883868069{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][gallery_carousel visible_items="3" gutter="no" hover_color="custom" custom_hover_color="rgba(10,10,10,0.15)" portfolio_filter="custom" filters="gallery"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_color="#f7f7f7" row_padding_top="120"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="400"]

WHAT CLIENT SAY

n today’s world of various portable smart devices, carrying charging cables and external batteries have become a necessity.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="50px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#f7f7f7" row_padding_bottom="120"][vc_column][testimonial layout="style2" style="light" visible_items="3" testimonial_animation="fade-in-bottom"][testimonial_item image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" author="John Hopkings" job="Product manager" text="Strong structure is a plus but how you implement this structure is much more important, you can restyle a great structure but building it from the scratch is not possible. Always focus on the backbone first."][testimonial_item image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" author="Nicol Nolan" job="Product designer" text="I've tested several themes... but this them is the one!! thanks guys for your nice theme thanks for your excellent support thanks for your nice job! best regards"][testimonial_item image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" author="Maria Kosari" job="Product designer" text="One of the best purchases I've made! They continue to make it even better each time they add a new feature. These guys know what they are doing and I highly recommend their work."][testimonial_item image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" author="Leo Martin " job="Co-founder" text="The theme design is spectacular ... I buy the theme because of the spectacular nice design.. And discover also your great support throughout the installation, even not caused by you, you where still did your best. Well done and hoop to see more coming .;) "][/testimonial][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="true" gap="zero" background_img_id="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" background_color="rgba(10,10,10,0.15)"][vc_column width="5/6" vertical_position="middle" css=".vc_custom_1525933233071{background-color: #f84326 !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-1"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="400" css=".vc_custom_1525686934554{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"]

NEW THINO COMING SOON

Thino is both a charging cable and an external battery. It has a dedicated plug and flexible band/cable for charging.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="400" css=".vc_custom_1525686248347{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"]
In today’s world of various portable smart devices, carrying charging cables and external batteries have become a necessity.
--Forodo Mayer [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="30px"][countdown end_date="2019-03-02T15:03" color="#ffffff" label_color="#ffffff" fontsize="48"][vc_empty_space height="80px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6" vertical_position="middle" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-1"][vc_empty_space height="20px"][embed_video video_display_type="embeded_video_youtube_popup" video_autoplay="disable" video_youtube_id="https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&v=vPGqoLWwjlI"][vc_column_text]

item.excerpt:encoded: Thino brings a new concept to on-the-go chargers, inspired by everyday user experiences. By combining the functions of a regular charging cable, an external battery, along with additional usability features, it provides an all-in-one solution to your device's charging needs.

item.excerpt:encoded: Thino brings a new concept to on-the-go chargers, inspired by everyday user experiences. By combining the functions of a regular charging cable, an external battery, along with additional usability features, it provides an all-in-one solution to your device's charging needs.
